title: Remove API restrictions for optimistic sync
body:
Remove throwing on the optimistic head and instead return is_execution_optimistic for the affecting apis, and let the validator handle/throw

See: https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/pull/2869

Changes:
 - add is_optimistic to 
   - [ ] getSyncingStatus api, see https://github.com/ethereum/beacon-APIs/blob/master/apis/node/syncing.yaml
 - 503 error for 
   - [ ] getAggregatedAttestation see https://github.com/ethereum/beacon-APIs/blob/master/apis/validator/aggregate_attestation.yaml
   - [ ] produceAttestationData see https://github.com/ethereum/beacon-APIs/blob/master/apis/validator/attestation_data.yaml
   - [ ] produceSyncCommitteeContribution see https://github.com/ethereum/beacon-APIs/blob/master/apis/validator/sync_committee_contribution.yaml
 - add execution_optimistic (boolean type, `true` if considering protoBlock's execStatus is ExecutionStatus.Syncing)  in
   - [ ]  getBlockAttestations see https://github.com/ethereum/beacon-APIs/blob/master/apis/beacon/blocks/attestations.yaml
   - [ ] GetBlockV2Response see https://github.com/ethereum/beacon-APIs/blob/master/apis/beacon/blocks/block.v2.yaml
   - [ ] GetBlockHeaderResponse see https://github.com/ethereum/beacon-APIs/blob/master/apis/beacon/blocks/header.yaml
   - [ ] GetBlockHeadersResponse see https://github.com/ethereum/beacon-APIs/blob/master/apis/beacon/blocks/header.yaml
   - [ ] GetBlockRootResponse see https://github.com/ethereum/beacon-APIs/blob/master/apis/beacon/blocks/root.yaml
   - [ ] GetEpochCommitteesResponse see https://github.com/ethereum/beacon-APIs/blob/master/apis/beacon/blocks/committee.yaml
   - [ ] GetStateFinalityCheckpointsResponse see https://github.com/ethereum/beacon-APIs/blob/master/apis/beacon/states/finality_checkpoints.yaml
   - [ ] GetStateForkResponse see https://github.com/ethereum/beacon-APIs/blob/master/apis/beacon/states/fork.yaml
   - [ ] GetStateRootResponse see https://github.com/ethereum/beacon-APIs/blob/master/apis/beacon/states/root.yaml
   - [ ] GetEpochSyncCommitteesResponse see https://github.com/ethereum/beacon-APIs/blob/master/apis/beacon/states/sync_committes.yaml
   - [ ] GetStateValidatorResponse see https://github.com/ethereum/beacon-APIs/blob/master/apis/beacon/states/validator.yaml
   - [ ] GetStateValidatorBalancesResponse see https://github.com/ethereum/beacon-APIs/blob/master/apis/beacon/states/validator_balances.yaml
   - [ ] GetStateValidatorsResponse see https://github.com/ethereum/beacon-APIs/blob/master/apis/beacon/states/validators.yaml
   - [ ] GetDebugChainHeadsResponse see https://github.com/ethereum/beacon-APIs/blob/master/apis/debug/heads.v2.yaml
   - [ ] GetStateV2Response see https://github.com/ethereum/beacon-APIs/blob/master/apis/debug/state.v2.yaml
   - [ ] GetAttesterDutiesResponse see https://github.com/ethereum/beacon-APIs/blob/master/apis/validator/duties/attester.v2.yaml
   - [ ] GetProposerDutiesResponse see https://github.com/ethereum/beacon-APIs/blob/master/apis/validator/duties/proposer.yaml
   - [ ] GetSyncCommitteeDutiesResponse see  https://github.com/ethereum/beacon-APIs/blob/master/apis/validator/duties/sync.yaml
 - eventstream  see  https://github.com/ethereum/beacon-APIs/blob/master/apis/eventstream/index.yaml
   - [ ] head
   - [ ] finalized_checkpoint
   - [ ] chain_reorg
